title: Analyze Weekly Content Performance
description: An editor wants to review the performance of all articles published last week to understand what resonated with the audience.

tasks.description: Pull a report from the analytics platform showing key metrics (page views, unique visitors, average engagement time) for all articles published last week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the raw performance data.

tasks.description: Identify the top 5 and bottom 5 performing articles based on page views.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates two lists of articles.

tasks.description: Analyze the topics and formats of the top-performing articles to identify potential trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a summary of insights, such as 'Human-interest stories with video performed best.'
